content.headline: Built for Enterprise Scale, Moves Like a Startup
paragraphs: ACI Infotech isn't trying to be the next Accenture. We're the alternative—large enough to staff Fortune 500 projects, small enough to make decisions in days not months, and focused enough to deliver deep expertise in the platforms enterprises actually use.

Founded in 2006, we've spent 19 years building one thing: production-grade enterprise systems. Not strategy. Not advisory. Not staff augmentation. We ship code that runs in production, carries SLAs, and delivers measurable ROI.

Our clients are Fortune 500 companies in banking, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, and hospitality. They choose us because we combine Big 4 capabilities with boutique speed and cost. Senior architects lead every project. We move fast. We cost 40-60% less. And we've been doing this long enough to have the scars and the case studies to prove it.
When your system goes down at 2am, we're the team that answers the phone. That's the difference between consultants who leave and engineers who stay.

content.headline: How We Work
content.subheadline: Three principles that define every engagement

principles.title: Outcome-Engineered
principles.description: Every engagement starts with baseline metrics and ends with audited results. We align on KPIs for time to value, cost to serve, and reliability, then instrument dashboards so progress is visible and decisions stay objective.

principles.title: Governed by Design
principles.description: Security, compliance, and lineage are built into data, models, and workflows. Policies as code. Full observability. Audit-ready by default. Speed never compromises trust. Our architectures pass SOC 2, ISO 27001, and industry-specific audits.
proof_points: Data quality gates at every stage

principles.title: Built for Scale
principles.description: Cross-functional pods that ship fast and stand behind SLAs. Product, data, apps, QA, and SRE work as one unit. Small releases, strong runbooks, clean handoffs.
